summary.span: 提供帮助你使用 X.509 v.3 证书的方法。

span.span: Provides methods that help you use X.509 v.3 certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. 在大多数情况下，应该改用类。For most scenarios, you should use the class instead. > [!IMPORTANT] > 从开始 ，此类型实现接口。 [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > > 对于面向[!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)]和更早版本的应用 ， 类不实现接口，因此不具有`Dispose`方法。For apps that target the [!INCLUDE[net_v452](~/includes/net-v452-md.md)] and earlier versions, the class does not implement the interface and therefore does not have a `Dispose` method. ## Examples 下面的示例从文件中加载 x.509 证书，调用方法，并将结果显示到控制台。The following example loads an X.509 certificate from a file, calls the method, and displays the results to the console. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/CPP/example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/CS/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate/VB/example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. 如果通过为`data`指定 PKCS7 签名的文件存储来创建证书，则会为对存储区（而不是存储区中的任何证书）签名的证书创建。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `data`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store. ## Examples 下面的示例将一个 x.509 证书文件加载到对象中，将该证书导出为一个字节数组，然后将该字节数组导入到另一个对象中。The following example loads an X.509 certificate file into an object, exports the certificate as a byte array, and then imports the byte array into another object. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate.Import-Export/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 Microsoft 加密 API 证书`PCCERT_CONTEXT`上下文的句柄创建新的对象。This constructor creates a new object using a handle for the Microsoft Cryptographic API certificate context, `PCCERT_CONTEXT`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此构造函数创建证书上下文的副本。This constructor creates a copy of the certificate context. 不要假设您传递给构造函数的上下文结构是有效的;它可能已被释放。Do not assume that the context structure you passed to the constructor is valid; it may have been released. 可以`PCCERT_CONTEXT` 从属性获取当前结构的副本，但它仅在对象的生存期内有效。 You can get a copy of the current `PCCERT_CONTEXT` structure from the property, but it is valid only during the lifetime of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用[Ildasm （IL 拆装器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器（例如 notepad.exe）中打开程序集来检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果通过为`rawData`指定 PKCS7 签名的文件存储来创建证书，则会为对存储区（而不是存储区中的任何证书）签名的证书创建。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用正确的密码调用此构造函数将对私钥进行解密，并将其保存到 Microsoft 加密 API 加密服务提供程序（CSP）。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). 只有此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用[Ildasm （IL 拆装器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器（例如 notepad.exe）中打开程序集来检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果通过为`rawData`指定 PKCS7 签名的文件存储来创建证书，则会为对存储区（而不是存储区中的任何证书）签名的证书创建。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.

exception.span: 发生了与证书有关的错误。

For example:
- The certificate file does not exist.
- The certificate is invalid.
- The certificate's password is incorrect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用字节数组、访问证书数据所需的密码和密钥存储标志来创建一个新的对象。This constructor creates a new object using a byte array, a password that is needed to access the certificate data, and a key storage flag. 使用正确的密码调用此构造函数将对私钥进行解密，并将其保存到 Microsoft 加密 API 加密服务提供程序（CSP）。Calling this constructor with the correct password decrypts the private key and saves it to a Microsoft Cryptographic API Cryptographic Service Provider (CSP). 值可用于控制导入私钥的位置和方式。The value can be used to control where and how the private key is imported. 只有此类支持的唯一证书格式。ASN.1 DER is the only certificate format supported by this class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 切勿在源代码中对密码进行硬编码。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用[Ildasm （IL 拆装器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)、十六进制编辑器或只是在文本编辑器（例如 notepad.exe）中打开程序集来检索硬编码的密码。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. 如果通过为`rawData`指定 PKCS7 签名的文件存储来创建证书，则会为对存储区（而不是存储区中的任何证书）签名的证书创建。If you create an certificate by specifying a PKCS7 signed file store for `rawData`, the is created for the certificate that signed the store rather than for any of the certificates within the store.
